landing.bio: Hello, I am very passionate about technology both hardware and software. Experienced in object-oriented programming and history of working in the information technology and services industry. Interested in modern technologies like AI, machine learning, and computation finance. Looking forward to making the world a better place for EVERYONE!

experience.aboutWork: Implemented Enterprise Architect Review Board with Kanban board in Jira to aid process efficiency. Collaborated with an Application System Engineer to automate transitions, fields update, email assignments, conditions and validations of project workflows in Groovy with ScriptRunner. Developed and Implemented custom fields with JavaScript in Jira project to create association between BMC Remedy ITSM tool and Salesforce SRM ticketing system. Utilized an enterprise business intelligence tool “MicroStrategy BI” to generate interactive monthly and quarterly dashboards

Applied images, installed software, configured devices for deployment for staff and faculty devices. Troubleshooted and modified both hardware and software issues for staff and faculty computers. Maintained confidentiality and integrity of information residing on client’s systems as well as physical security of those systems. Maintained and reset Digital Learning Center labs for 490+ computers between two campuses

Collaborated on a software development team of four to create a software application for a robot to serve customers in a local coffee shop. Modified and debugged robotic programming with Java testing framework TestNG and Junit. Collaborated with Mobile Application Engineers to design a user-friendly café menu in Java with Android Studio to aid efficient ordering

education.major: Computer Science with minor Business Management

projects.title: AI Pac Man
projects.aboutProject: Implemented Pac-Man agents using artificial intelligent algorithms such as DFS, BFS, A* search, alpha-beta pruning, minimax, expectimax and a model free reinforcement learning algorithm. Designed strategies for the agents to play a multi-player capture-the-flag variant of Pacman.

projects.title: Machine Learning Final Project
projects.aboutProject: Collaborated in a team of four to analyze datasets from Scikit-learn library with linear regression, multivariate regression, decision tree, SVM and multi-layer perception classifier. Analyzed and generated ad-hoc reports with Jupyter Notebook and Latex
